description.name: usdcmonad
description.tagline: USDC Monad Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto monad-usdc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept USDC Monad directly on your website
Unique monad/usdc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your monad/usdc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
